Welcome to py-coinspot-api’s documentation!¶

Contents:

class coinspot.Coinspot(api_key, api_secret, endpoint='www.coinspot.com.au')¶

Coinspot class implementing API calls for the Coinspot API

balances()¶

List my balances

Returns:status - ok, error balances - object containing one property for each coin with your balance for that coin.
buy(cointype, amount, rate)¶

Place buy orders

Parameters:
  • cointype – the coin shortname in uppercase, example value ‘BTC’, ‘LTC’, ‘DOGE’
  • amount – the amount of coins you want to buy, max precision 8 decimal places
  • rate – the rate in AUD you are willing to pay, max precision 6 decimal places
Returns:

status - ok, error
coindeposit(cointype)¶

Deposit coins

Parameters:cointype – the coin shortname in uppercase, example value ‘BTC’, ‘LTC’, ‘DOGE’
Returns:status - ok, error address - your deposit address for the coin
myorders()¶

List my buy and sell orders

Returns:status - ok, error buyorders - array containing all your buy orders sellorders - array containing all your sell orders
orderhistory(cointype)¶

Lists the last 1000 completed orders

Parameters:cointype – the coin shortname in uppercase, example value ‘BTC’, ‘LTC’, ‘DOGE’
Returns:status - ok, error orders - list of the last 1000 completed orders
orders(cointype)¶

Lists all open orders

Parameters:cointype – the coin shortname in uppercase, example value ‘BTC’, ‘LTC’, ‘DOGE’
Returns:status - ok, error buyorders - array containing all the open buy orders sellorders - array containing all the open sell orders
quotebuy(cointype, amount)¶

Quick buy quote

Fetches a quote on rate per coin and estimated timeframe to buy an amount of coins

Parameters:
  • cointype – the coin shortname in uppercase, example value ‘BTC’, ‘LTC’, ‘DOGE’
  • amount – the amount of coins to sell
Returns:

status - ok, error quote - the rate per coin timeframe - estimate of hours to wait for trade to complete (0 = immediate trade)
quotesell(cointype, amount)¶

Quick sell quote

Fetches a quote on rate per coin and estimated timeframe to sell an amount of coins

Parameters:
  • cointype – the coin shortname in uppercase, example value ‘BTC’, ‘LTC’, ‘DOGE’
  • amount – the amount of coins to sell
Returns:

status - ok, error quote - the rate per coin timeframe - estimate of hours to wait for trade to complete (0 = immediate trade)
sell(cointype, amount, rate)¶

Place sell orders

Parameters:
  • cointype – the coin shortname in uppercase, example value ‘BTC’, ‘LTC’, ‘DOGE’
  • amount – the amount of coins you want to sell, max precision 8 decimal places
  • rate – the rate in AUD you are willing to sell for, max precision 6 decimal places
Returns:

status - ok, error
sendcoin(cointype, address, amount)¶

Send coins

Parameters:
  • cointype – the coin shortname in uppercase, example value ‘BTC’, ‘LTC’, ‘DOGE’
  • address – the address to send the coins to
  • amount – the amount of coins to send
Returns:

status - ok, error
spot()¶

Fetch the latest spot prices

Returns:status - ok, error spot - a list of the current spot price for each coin type
